targets.expr: count(uimp_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}) by (workload,workload_type)
count(uimp_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace="$namespace"}) by (workload,workload_type)

(sum(irate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) uimp_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".+"}) by (workload,workload_type))

(sum(irate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$interval])
* on (namespace,pod)
group_left(workload,workload_type) uimp_pod_workload{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", workload=~".+"}) by (workload,workload_type))
